comment: I feel like we need to log out and do something IRL at some point. We still don't know anything about Travis outside of the game except that he's a bit of a recluse. We should meet up with our IRL friends who also play the game and discuss it. I'd also like to look into the game dev for BSO just out of curiosity. Also I'd like to see if there are any real world aspects of our deteriorating mental state in game.
name: Anonymous
